pageContext.claim: “Funny thing about James Comey. Everybody wanted him fired, Republican and Democrat alike. After the rigged & botched Crooked Hillary investigation, where she was interviewed on July 4th Weekend, not recorded or sworn in, and where she said she didn't know anything (a lie).”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often complains that Clinton was not "sworn in" when she was interrogated by the FBI. However, as the Russia investigation has repeatedly shown, lying to an FBI agent is a punishable crime not all that different from lying under oath.
